wikipedia_page.main: William Hewitt (17 January 1795 – 1870) was an English cricketer who was associated with Nottingham Cricket Club and made his first-class debut in 1827. He played for Nottingham from 1817 to 1829.

response: *William Hewitt (minister) (born 1951), Moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland
